tool_description: Apply promotional credits from the Rapid DevRel team to your account. Check the tutorials tab to read how.
title: RapidAPI Credits

api_list.name: Step 1: Apply Coupon
api_list.description:
Use your RapidAPI account email and coupon code to apply a coupon to your account.

P.S. Credits can only be applied via the [Test Endpoint] button on RapidAPI.com. Credits API can not be implemented in your own application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com/add-coupon"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Step 2: Check Account Balance
api_list.description: Check your current account balance. Press [Test Endpoint] button (no config).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com/account-balance"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Step 1: Apply Coupon
api_list.description:
Use your RapidAPI account email and coupon code to apply a coupon to your account.

P.S. Credits can only be applied via the [Test Endpoint] button on RapidAPI.com. Credits API can not be implemented in your own application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com/add-coupon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com/add-coupon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapidapi-credits.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
